title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Skills: Mathematics Instructional Design and Utilization Competencies in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Capability to design effective math learning modules in mobile environments by applying Merrill’s instructional principles (problem-centered approach, activation strategies, etc.)
Ability to develop online math teaching strategies considering learners’ technology acceptance (perceived usefulness/ease of use)

Learners will develop one microlearning scenario applicable to real corporate training contexts (new employee onboarding or leadership development) through a project-based assessment over 2–4 weeks. They must submit a result meeting at least two of three rubric criteria: field applicability (≥80%), learning effectiveness (≥75%), technical feasibility (≥85%).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
